import react from 'react'; import NavigationBar from './NavigationBar'; const NodeSummary = () => { return (

Snapshot of Node

node summery

Node is designed for network applications. It is event driven programming for web servers that helps fast development of webservers that use Javascript. For example the npm command used in the react tutorial in this website.



node is made for building user interfaces that are favoured to be one page

Great things about node

  • JSX files are able to use html tags inside of them which makes for great front-end programming
  • Popularity of a language makes sure that it likely something good to invest your time into learning as many companies will be seeking node devs.
  • node is a very simple and easy to learn framework that does not suffer on preformance.
{/* Source: https://www.better.dev/node-popularity */}

Problems with node

  • JSX syntax is not the easiest to understand as its a mix of HTML and Javascript. This can create a stronger barrier of entry.
  • The rapid developement of node makes it difficult to stay relevent with node as it is constantly changing and the most optomized and best functions are constantly changing.

Who uses node?

Here is a list of popular companies who use node:
Bloomberg, Facebook, Uber Eats, Discord, Instagram, Pinterest, Walmart, Wix

Why I care

A lot of buisnessess are choosing to use node so picking node for this project will hopefully build my portfolio

node is a great rising framework that most new buisnessess are opting for over other frameworks



); } export default NodeSummary;
